variant=chipkit-pro-mx7
description=chipKIT Pro MX7
group=chipKIT
platform=pic32
board=_BOARD_PRO_MX7_
board.flags=-D_USB
ccflags=ffff
ldscript=chipKIT-application-32MX795F512${upload.${prefs:board.${prefs:board}.programmer}.ldsuffix}.ld
upload.protocol=stk500v2
upload.maximum_size=520192
upload.speed=115200
build.mcu=32MX795F512L
build.f_cpu=80000000L
build.core=chipkit
build.variant=chipkit-pro-mx7
family=pic32
version=0.3
revision=2
core=chipkit
name=chipkit-pro-mx7

bootloader.file=${board:root}/Cerebot-MX7cK
